name: LaserStrafe
description:
LaserStrafe is a fast-paced and chaotic top-down shooter.

This is a game I made for a school project. At the end of the game, there is a quick survey that asks about your experience with the game. This anonymous data will be used to help with the project.

I probably won't continue working on this project outside of fixing bugs or glitches. However, if you do enjoy the game, let me know, as I might work on similar games in the future!
